settings.title: Overview
settings.text: Lion's Mane is a brain-boosting mushroom. It helps improve your thinking, clarity, and mood. Packed into a natural, plant-based capsule, this mushroom will keep your mind healthy and active

settings.title: Ingredients
settings.text: Organic Lion's Mane Extract (standardized to contain 31% Beta-Glucan)(Hericium erinaceus)(Fruiting Body), Pullulan Capsule

settings.title: Directions
settings.text: A bottle includes 60 capsules. You can take them whenever it suits you, either with food or on an empty stomach

settings.heading: safe and organic
settings.text: Our mushrooms are as organic as grandma’s home-baked cookies. Grown without any nasty chemicals, we ensure that each mushroom is rigorously tested and safe for consumption.

settings.question: Are your products safe?
settings.answer: The recommended dosage is on the package. Usually, you take them once or twice a day with meals. But for the best results, just follow the instructions on the label. Easy peasy!

settings.title: I was initially skeptical about an all-natural product, given the mixed reviews, but I decided to give it a shot.
settings.text: I'm glad I did because I've noticed a significant boost in my energy levels and overall well-being."
settings.name: Renata Molchanova

settings.title: This stuff is amazing! I've been taking it for three months, and I can genuinely feel the difference in my daily life.
settings.text: No more brain fatigue, and my health has definitely improved.
settings.name: Denys Dream

settings.title: I often hit creative blocks where I can't come up with any ideas,
settings.text: but since adding Lion's mane to my diet, I've noticed a surge in good ideas and a significant boost in my creativity.
settings.name: Frank Uver

settings.title: I recently decided to get into fitness, and it was harder than I expected.
settings.text: I often felt drained and struggled to recover after intense workouts. After finding an article about Lion's mane, I gave it a try, and soon after, I felt more energetic and well-rested. I highly recommend it to anyone looking to improve their life.
settings.name: Dmitry Tretniev

settings.title: I've been using these for a week now and I feel way more focused at work.
settings.text: I don't get as tired or irritable anymore either. No more brain fog since I started, so I highly recommend them.
settings.name: Alex Thompson
